Reviews.Title: It doesn't even deserve one star! Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: We wanted to try an inexpensive camera for my young kids as test.  This camera is completely horrible.  I bought it through a different vendor than Amazon for $7, which even at that low of a price, it was a complete waste of money.  It will not take a picture unless the lighting is just right.  Even in a well lit room, it doesn't take pictures.  There isn't screen to see the picture after you take it, just a little counter of how many pictures are left.  Save up for a better camera.

Reviews.Title: more toy less camera
Reviews.Author: Danyell Rejcek
Reviews.Content: great for a younger kid a first camera type of thing but beyond that you will be disappointed.... think about it first

ProductInfo.Features:
PalmCliX camera is bundled with CD-ROM with the Ulead Photo Express 4.0 software.
VGA: 640 x 480 Pixels
Camera Size: 2 3/16" x 2 11/16" x O.5"
Includes USB cable and 1 AAA battery.
Just point and click!
ProductInfo.Name: Palm Clix Complete Pocket Digital Camera/Webcam
